participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, loves to express herself through music and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I am in high school apart of the school band. Music has always been my number one passion. My mom is my favorite person of all people. I have to live by a schedule in order to keep my mind right.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and cheerful, enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong appreciation for nature.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is one direction. I love to hike in the summer. My name is Mary and I am from Colorado. The weather here is very cold, but so beautiful in the spring. I love to ski in the winter.

content.text: Hi, my name is participant_1.
Hi participant_2, my name is Mary.
It's nice to meet you, Mary.
Nice to meet you too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to hike in the summer and ski in the winter.
That sounds like fun! I've never been skiing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's so much fun!
I will! I'm from [place], but I'm currently in [place] for school.
Oh, that's cool! I'm from [place].
What do you do for fun in [place]?
I love to go hiking, skiing, and fishing.
That sounds like fun! I've never been fishing before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should definitely try it! It's really relaxing.
I will! I'm sure I'll love it.
I'm sure you will!
So, what kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is One Direction.
Oh, I love One Direction! I saw them in concert a few years ago.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to see them in concert.
It was amazing! They put on a great show.
I'm sure they did! I'm so jealous.
You should definitely try to see them if they come to your area.
I will! I'm sure I'll love it.
